solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isValid(String s) {--newline--        Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<Character>();--newline--        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {--newline--            if (c == '(')--newline--                stack.push(')');--newline--            else if (c == '{')--newline--                stack.push('}');--newline--            else if (c == '[')--newline--                stack.push(']');--newline--            else if (stack.isEmpty() || stack.pop() != c)--newline--                return false;--newline--        }--newline--        return stack.isEmpty();--newline--    }--newline--}
